##  Study Title:  Ambient and Passive Monitoring of Circadian Timing of Sleep and Medication in People with Epilepsy (TimeAlign)

&nbsp;  
&nbsp; 



### Dear Research Participant,  

 


Thank you for your interest and support of TimeAlign, a research project at Maynooth University and RCSI that is investigating the effects of timing of medication in epilepsy.  We are really pleased that you are thinking of  participating in TimeAlign, and we hope that these webpages will tell you everything you need to know.

Please do not hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions, we would love to hear from you (TimeAlign\@mu.ie)

With many thanks for your interest in our research.
